website_summaries.verdict: A simple, yet elegant weatherproof post light that will blend in with any decor.
pros: Made of cast aluminum with a weatherproof seal to stop water and bugs from getting in
Attaches securely to any sized post
Easy to install and all materials are included
cons: Some users have complained of quality issues and pieces breaking

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Attractive!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 5 of these fixtures in 2016 to place on a wall across back of the patio. The price is very reasonable and the fixtures are pretty well made as well as attractive. Black in color....the cast aluminum will keep them from rusting in our Florida location. We are proud to announce that these lamps survived Hurricane Irma. No paint chips, no cracked or broken glass panels. Now that is a recommendation! Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Beck

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy metal fixture
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy metal fixture. The dimensions seemed good, but it could stand to be a little wider. The set screws for attaching it to the pole are too long. They'll work but it looks nicer with the shorter ones I picked up at the hardware store. The wiring is good and easy to attach even with a photocell on the pole. It looks nice when off during the day, or on when it's dark. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Chewy

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made. 😥
customer_reviews.text: Looks really nice. Made from paper- thin aluminum. Had mine less than 2 months and is already broken. (Snapped off at base) Spend a little more and get a quality unit. On a positive note, shipping was quick. Hope this helps. 🤔
customer_reviews.author: cjb63

customer_reviews.title: Last about 3 years.
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these and they have been great...until just less than a week ago when both snapped off just below the light fixture at the skinniest part of the light fixture. This was not caused by high winds or getting hit. Within a week of each other they both snapped off, not well casted probably. I guess if you are ok with paying the cost of these and knowing that they will only last a few years they will be great for you...me, I'm moving on to something that will last.
customer_reviews.author: P. W. Achleman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful post light.
customer_reviews.text: Just received and installed the post light today. The light itself is beautiful and well-priced. My only issue is with the two screws that secure the top (as noted in several other reviews). The screws do not fit securely against the lamp, even with the 2 rubber washers provided. Thus, a small part of the screw is exposed. I forsee needing to reach out to the company for replacement screws after changing the bulb a few times. The receiving screw holes were not machines deep enough.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. I replaced the 4 old lamps in ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. I replaced the 4 old lamps in my driveway with these and I'm very happy. I also used some really powerful LED bulbs (25W Daylight LED Corn Light Bulb) and the lamps work great! Only small con is the screws you use to mount them onto the pole. They are a little long, but otherwise they do the job.

customer_reviews.title: They look nice, and so far function fine
customer_reviews.text: We bought seven of these lights for a brick flower bed that goes across the length of our home. They look nice, and so far function fine. We have a nice glow on sidewalk and accent lighting on front of house from these fixtures. When shopping, I found similar fixtures for much more in price. If I was buying only one, this may have been an option. With seven, it was way too much money for me.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and easy to wire. Took me about 30 minutes but most of that was due to the existing power cord being somewhat short. Still, it was easy to put together. One bit of warning though. This does NOT have a built-in light sensor. I had to purchase that from my local Ace Hardware store.
